Auxiliary function for estimate_hazard

dot-hazard_core.Rd

Auxiliary function for estimate_hazard

Usage

.hazard_core(
  support,
  trunc_time,
  lifetime,
  censoring_indicator,
  event_indicator,
  carry_hazard
)

Arguments

support

where to calculate the hazards

trunc_time

A numeric vector representing the observed left-truncated time.

lifetime

A numeric vector representing the observed time to event.

censoring_indicator

An indicator for censoring (1=censored, 0=not). Defaults to a vector of 0s if NULL. An observation is only treated as an event if status=1 AND censoring=0.

event_indicator

legacy.

carry_hazard

A boolean indicator on whether 0 hazard estimates should be replaced by the last non-zero estimate. Defaults to FALSE

Value

a data.frame

Author

lcgodoy

On this page

Developed by Lucas da Cunha Godoy, Jackson Lautier.

Site built with pkgdown 2.2.0.
